name: Sam's Farm
description: You arrive in a simple house, and looking outside it appears that you are on a farm. The farm has vast expanses of land that look to be growing different kinds of fruit. The farm, called Sam's Farm, needs your help to plant seeds and save it from not being able to grow food. In this game, you will need to read the story and find ways to restore the farm. However, you will also need to watch out for dangerous creatures and areas on the map, although sometimes it may be worth the risk!
